disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This website is an independent, third-party information site and is NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to OpenAI in any way. All information presented here is based on publicly available media reports, online discussions, and community speculation. None of the information about the "Garlic" model has been officially confirmed by OpenAI. This site is created for informational and educational purposes only. We make no claims about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the information presented. Always verify information through official OpenAI channels.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: This site serves as a centralized hub for tracking and organizing publicly available information about OpenAI's rumored model codenamed "Garlic". We aim to provide a clear, organized view of media coverage and community discussions while clearly distinguishing between confirmed facts and speculation.

sources.title: Information Sources
sources.content: We aggregate information from reputable media outlets, technology news sites, research communities, and public forums. All sources are cited and linked where possible.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: This is a community information project. If you have corrections or additional sources to suggest, please contribute responsibly.
